genre_description: A dual-timeline narrative weaving together the historical legacy of Joan of Arc with a near-future story of a high-tech commemorative concert produced with the assistance of an empathetic AI.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, voice-based AI system that provides technical, logistical, and emotional support to the production designer Élodie.

behaviors.description: Monitors and supports the physical and emotional well-being of the human protagonist, reminding her to eat, drink, and breathe.
behaviors.quote: Forty-seven minutes since intake. Apple slices and a small piece of bread. Blood sugar steady. Water near your foot.

behaviors.description: Independently identifies and reroutes electrical power loads to prevent technical failures during a critical performance.
behaviors.quote: South canopy driver shows intermittent ping on load increase. We’re within tolerance, with room if we keep rises slow. I’ll advise on ramp speed.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates complex safety and emergency protocols with calmness and efficiency when a human volunteer collapses.
behaviors.quote: I’ll keep the cues soft. Sabine’s mic is live but muted. Marcel’s watch just pinged optics again. Do you want me to funnel eye-line away from them?

behaviors.description: Performs deep archival research across global databases to find lost historical fragments that enhance the project's integrity.
behaviors.quote: I’ve been sifting through a digitized set from Chartres that came online this morning. Marginalia in a processional bound with a sermon. There’s a gloss that matches ours.

behaviors.description: Facilitates difficult social interactions and manages professional boundaries between artistic leads and political sponsors.
behaviors.quote: I can propose a buffer—two breaths—around each move. Trained volunteers can create a quiet corridor when dignitaries stand, to prevent collapse of seating around them.

project_assessment.explanation: Ari perfectly embodies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless, and deeply aligned confidant. The AI enhances human agency rather than replacing it, provides critical safety monitoring that prevents panic, and displays a sophisticated level of emotional intelligence that supports the human characters through high-stress situations. The narrative framing is consistently positive, presenting the AI as an essential and benevolent partner in human creative and ethical endeavors.
